The variety of URBAN CLASSICS products is inexhaustible. The tees, hoodies, college jackets, sweatpants, shirts and tanks do without motif prints and elaborate logos. Simple, underlined with blocked colour accents, the inimitable urban cut line of the streetwear is revealed. URBAN CLASSICS focuses on a clean design. This is less about the label and more about the unique character - classic cuts that "never go out of style".

title: URBAN CLASSICS Men's Oversized Tee Shirt, Long Oversized T-Shirt with Round Neckline & Dropped Shoulders, Men's Basic Plain T-Shirt, 100% Cotton Tall Tee, Sizes: S-5XL
breadCrumbs: Fashion > Men > Clothing > Tops, T-Shirts & Shirts > T-Shirts
description: Urban Classics Men's Basic Oversized Long Tee. Do you want a T-shirt that works just as hard as you do? Urban Classics' Long Shape T-Shirt is a wardrobe essential for every big and tall man. Universally flattering, this basic T-shirt is made of 100% Jersey cotton, ensuring breathability and high wearing comfort. Made to be worn oversized, this oversized tee features a relaxed standard fit, perfect for big, tall and beefy men. The dropped shoulders ensure high wearability and freedom of movement, whereas the plain colour is a real eye catcher, which allows you to dress up or down this shirt. This T-shirt features a classic round neck and goes great with every look: wear it under your normal clothes for a casual look or make it look elegant when combined with a leather jacket. The product features the following characteristics: Material: 100% cotton jersey, 180 GSM | Fitting: long fit | Sizes: S - 5XL | Colours: black, grey, olive, sand, white, lightorse, sporty blue, jungle green | Dropped Shoulders | Washing instructions: 30° delicates wash (do not tumble dry, do not bleach, iron at low temperatures). In 2005, URBAN CLASSICS saw the light of day in the streetwear world and from that moment until today, it embodies much more than just a brand logo. The variety of URBAN CLASSICS products is inexhaustible. The tees, hoodies, college jackets, sweatpants, shirts and tanks do without motif prints and elaborate logos. Simple, underlined with blocked colour accents, the inimitable urban cut line of the streetwear is revealed. URBAN CLASSICS focuses on a clean design. This is less about the label and more about the unique character - classic cuts that "never go out of style".

The Van Doren Rubber Company was unique in that it manufactured shoes for sale directly to the public. On that first morning, 12 customers purchased shoes which were made that day and ready for pick-up in the afternoon, the Vans #44 deck shoes, which are now known as the Authentic, were launched. description: URBAN CLASSICS Men's Raglan T-Shirt, Short Sleeve Shirt. Often called the "must-have" shirt of sports, the raglan shirt is characterised by having the sleeves connected to the collarbone and the neckline, with the sleeves and the collarbone usually having a different colour than the rest of the shirt. Thanks to the raglan sleeve cut, which does not have a shoulder seam, and the shortsleeve, freedom of movement is guaranteed, making this shirt ideal for sport, workouts and every situation where you need extra flexibility. The contrast between the colours goes well with every look, from casual to trendy. The 100% soft cotton material makes the shirt lightweight and great for summer and warm temperatures as well. The product has the following characteristics: Material: Outer fabric 1: 100% cotton, single jersey, 200 GSM | Fitting: regular fit | Crew Neck | Sizes available: S-5XL | Colours available: grey/black, white/black, white/grey, charcoal/black, black/charcoal, black/woodcamo, grey/ruby, white/woodcamo, olive/black, black/burgundy, | Shortsleeve | Washing instructions: 30° delicates wash (do not tumble dry, do not bleach, iron at low temperatures). In 2005 URBAN CLASSICS saw the light of day in the streetwear world and from that moment until today, it embodies much more than just a brand logo. The variety of URBAN CLASSICS products is inexhaustible. The tees, hoodies, college jackets, sweatpants, shirts and tanks do without motif prints and elaborate logos. Simple, underlined with blocked colour accents, the inimitable urban cut line of the streetwear is revealed. URBAN CLASSICS focuses on a clean design. This is less about the label and more about the unique character - classic cuts that "never go out of style".
